quote: "Forget plan B. To test yourself and grow, you have to operate without a safety net"
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: "It's simple, be a good person and good things happen"
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: "Don't compare yourself with anyone in this world. If you do so, you are insulting yourself"
author: Bill Gates
occupation: Business Magnate - Software Developer - Investor - Philanthropist

quote: "The moment you give up, is the moment you let someone else win"
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: "Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life"
author: Steve Jobs

quote: "When KFC came to China, 24 people went for the job, 23 people were accepted-I was the only guy."
author: Jack Ma

quote: "It's up to you whether you drive a Toyota or a BMW"
author: Tu Liang Yang

quote: "There will be a cure for all illnesses, but never one for regret."
author: Xian Ming Li
